name: Machdragon
about: Competitive Canadian Duel Links player, Computer Science and Business student, Strategy and Data analyst, Team Wars Team: VIP, Spreadsheet master, Crimson Magic clansman, Servant Class Archer
accomplishments: Duel Links: KC Cup Top 100 Global Nov 2017 and Feb 2018,YGO TCG player since 2011,Multiple Checkmate Top 10s,Pokemon VGC player 2011-16,5th place Spring Regionals 2012,Bo1 cheese master
